mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.name AS "name", a.prod_code AS "prodCode", a.brand_id AS "brandId", a.brand_name AS "brandName", a.description AS "description", a.vendor_id AS "vendorId", a.min_price AS "minPrice", a.max_price AS "maxPrice", a.status AS "status", a.create_id AS "createId.id", a.create_time AS "createTime", a.u_version AS "uVersion", a.update_time AS "updateTime", a.update_id AS "updateId.id"
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM biz_product_info a
a.status = #{DEL_FLAG_NORMAL}
AND a.name LIKE '%'||#{name}||'%' '%'+#{name}+'%' concat('%',#{name},'%')
AND a.prod_code LIKE '%'||#{prodCode}||'%' '%'+#{prodCode}+'%' concat('%',#{prodCode},'%')
AND a.brand_name LIKE '%'||#{brandName}||'%' '%'+#{brandName}+'%' concat('%',#{brandName},'%')
ORDER BY ${page.orderBy}
